author: Mikikazu Komatsu
title: Hell's Paradise Anime Opening & Ending Theme Music Videos Now Streamed
description: Crunchyroll is streaming the MAPPA-animated dark fantasy action anime
content:
After a well-received broadcast launch in Japan on April 1, music videos for the opening and ending theme songs for the spring 2023 TV anime Hell's Paradise have also been streamed on YouTube.
